glGetFloatv

Parameters:
pname - GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, GL_PROJECTION_MATRIX or GL_TEXTURE_MATRIX
params - the FloatBuffer's position remains unchanged, which is the same behavior than the native JOGL GL impl
